description: Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi addresses the nation through his Radio Address, Mann Ki Baat. This month's episode sees citizens from various corners of the nation addressing their questions and sug
caption: soundcloud.com
message:
25th #MannKiBaat episode on a special day…extended greetings for the festive season & paid tributes to our Jawans. Expressed joy on the unimaginable & historic response to #Sandesh2Soldiers. It shows the special place our forces have in people’s hearts.

Shared thoughts on urgent need to understand aspirations of the poor & work towards transformative solutions that empower our citizens. https://soundcloud.com/narendramodi/pm-modis-mann-ki-baat-october-2016
